import React from 'react' import Loading from '../Loading/Loading' // import { repo } from '../../data' function ReposDiv({data}) { let color = 'blue' return (
{ data.length ? data.map((ane) => { repo.language === 'CSS' ? color = 'blue' :repo.language === 'JavaScript' ? color = 'orange' : repo.language === 'HTML' ? color = 'red' : color = 'black' return ( <>
{repo.name} {repo.visibility}

{repo.description}

{repo.language} ★

{repo.stargazers_count}

)}) : }
) } export default ReposDiv
